channel.title: Collab / mashup challenge
channel.description:
I had an idea for a collab and mashup challenge, and I wanted to see what others think. The way I see it working is along these lines:
* If you want to take part, find an old crappy sounding 4- or 8-bar loop that you've never been able to turn into a track and submit it to this thread. * After a week of people submitting loops the competition begins, and everyone then has one week to take the loops and turn them into a song. * You're allowed to use as many loops as you want, but you must use **at least 2** and one of them must be the loop that **you** submitted. * Loops can be modified to work in your new song, as long as they're still identifiable. * Use any key, any tempo, any swing amount, any instruments, any length (within reason!) * Your song needs to be complete, not a demo or an outline. * Entries must be uploaded to SoundCloud.
In terms of selecting your 4- or 8-bar loop, this should ideally be something that's been kicking around forever (I'm sure we all have loops that we want to do something with eventually, but never seem to get back round to). Most of mine sound crappy, but I'm sure there's a spark of something in there that could be explored. Those are the loops I'd like people to select.
If we start with 5 crappy sounding loops, and end with 5 nice polished songs then that'd be a win all round, right? :smiley:
So what do people think? Sound like fun?
https://disco.auxy.co/t/collab-mashup-challenge-5-days-left/4008/18?u=lowey

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
TMAR:

Also was it @enby I used!?

TMAR:

I double checked it guys I didn’t use @enbys loop I just changed my freak notes A little bit!

Yeah the hook that comes in at 0:22 sounds like a modified version of my loop (instrument changed to Stress by the sounds of it, and simplified to remove the chords). But at 1:06 it sounds like Freak comes into play, which was what was in Enby’s loop.

Read full topic

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: TMAR
item.description:
@lowey thanks man! I wish I’d of spent more time on the track tbh but I still had fun with it. Also was it @enby I used!? Sorry for the mix up guys I’ll change that. Lastly, I also think we should do this again. It was a really unique idea to get everyone to write together like this!

@iammane yeah she’s feeling better thanks for asking dude!

Read full topic

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Well at least one other person has expressed an interest in taking part in this if it were to happen again so you might be in luck there I was originally thinking about waiting a month to do another, but that’d put us in the middle of the xmas season … so may be better to wait until January.

Read full topic

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Okay … time’s up! We had excellent submissions from:

@enby https://soundcloud.com/lagrangain/tinge-ft-industry-city-sleepers-tmar/s-z8iNC
@TMAR https://soundcloud.com/user-105567752/loop-for-the-looperman-ft-1/s-UwKio
@iammane https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/hibernate-under-fiery-skies
@lowey https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/synergy-feat-enby-and-tmar

Those who shared publicly have had their tracks added to the following playlist: https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/sets/collab-mashup-challenge (after a LOT of grappling with SoundCloud – seriously that site isn’t fit for purpose!)

Thanks everyone! It was amazing to see how you all started from the same place yet finished with such different tracks. I loved hearing how different loops were interpreted and reimagined so differently when picked up by another Auxian, and hopefully you all took away a little inspiration from this challenge.

You all deserve a

Read full topic

Bloody SoundCloud… I had to click the like button about 20 times before it finally worked!

TMAR:

sorry for the late submission

Not late, you were within the deadline

Awesome track, great job of mashing the loops together and making them work in the same song. Also it sounds to me like you’ve got Enby’s loop in there too (but correct me if I’m wrong).

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/synergy-feat-enby-and-tmar

My mix is (finally) up! In the end I went with loops from @TMAR and @enby, as well as my own (of course). Not entirely happy with this one but only had limited time to do this today and wanted to get something up before the deadline. It needs more polish, but I can’t do that when I’m sick of listening to it :-/ Kind of used up all of my creative juices on my track for the Auxy tournament (which I also wrote entirely today in my limited free time!)

@TMAR and @Raeko … guys you need to get your tracks finished! You have ~10 hours from the time on this post!

Read full topic

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
@enby Thanks! I’m glad you could get some insight on new techniques and stuff. The last big update (with the automation) has made a night and day difference with this app. Makes it less of a toy and more serious.

@lowey thanks both you guys for checking with IVO would hate to have to redo it. Was looking to include it in an “album” down the road.

I’ll have to listen to the tracks later I’m chasing my kids around and Thanksgiving is today so I have no time lol… looking forward to listening tomorrow!!

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: enby
item.description:
I really like this song and I wanna make it an official release on my SC, but I’ll keep it private until IVO’s involvement is confirmed (or not). I used loops contributed by @iammane and @TMAR as well as my own. I gotta say, @iammane, the automations you had in your original loop are the driving force in this song. I learned some cool new techniques from you! You guys can listen to the song here and download the project to see which loops I used specifically here.

Edit: The loop TMAR submitted came from is BTC #20. IVO doesn’t have a problem with us using the loop.

Edit 2: Also, if any of you can pinpoint what genre this is closest too, that’d be great.

Read full topic

item.title: Collab / mashup challenge
item.dc:creator: enby
item.description:
I just wanna give credit where credit’s due, ya know? Especially with all these problems we’re having with plagarism right now. I suspect it’s an old IVO song that TMAR was attempting to remix. Couldn’t find the title “Loop for the Looperman” in the Auxy forum or on IVO’s SC, though.

Read full topic
